articles.title: 'Be Black and be proud … You don't let the world decide beauty … Butts are popular. I'm trying to lose mine, and people are trying to get mine!' Serena Williams - The Indian Express
articles.description: On the eve of her last tournament before retirement Serena Williams talks about her legacy.
